basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. James Machell Leadership Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies. Eligibility Requirements Must be a declared CEPS major Must submit resume 3.0 or higher GPA Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
